backend/main.mo: Actor module managing user profiles, dance classes, sessions, bookings, video lessons, inquiries, and permissions with AccessControl and various typed states.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected components, related files, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their responsibilities across routing, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables, dark mode variants, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with a root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup and layout wrapper with header, footer, profile setup logic, reminders, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple unauthorized-access screen with a message, icon, and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal allowing new users to submit basic profile data using a mutation and form validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/Registratio: User registration form that validates input and saves a new user profile via mutation, showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Access control wrapper that allows only admin users to view protected content and shows an access-denied screen otherwise.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Button that books a session after ensuring the user is logged in, handling login prompts, booking mutation, and toast messages.
Per-booking reminder component that periodically checks session times and shows upcoming class reminders once per session.
Manager that periodically checks all user bookings for reminder settings, currently logging checks without fetching full session data.
frontend/src/components/classes/ClassEdi: Dialog form for creating a new dance class, validating required fields and submitting via mutation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/instructor/Sessi: Static panel UI prompting instructors to select a session to view its roster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing site credits, navigation links, and instructor contact details with an image and icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component that displays navigation links and auth-based options, including admin and instructor menus, with mobile support and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/lessons/LessonEd: Dialog form for creating a new video lesson, collecting metadata and submitting via uploadLesson hook.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayForB: Button that creates a Stripe checkout session for a booking and redirects the user to the payment URL.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Dialog form to create a new class session, building a Session object from user inputs and submitting via createSession.
frontend/src/constants/classLevels.ts: Defines available class level strings and their TypeScript type.
frontend/src/constants/danceStyles.ts: Defines supported dance styles and their TypeScript type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingDetails.ts: Fetches session and class details for a booking and returns combined loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingReminderSet: Manages per-booking reminder settings with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Hooks to fetch the callerâ€™s user role and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves the current user's profile via the backend actor with controlled loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating dance classes, sessions, bookings, videos, Stripe config, and user/contact data through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Provides mutations to create Stripe checkout sessions and check their status using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Admin page that loads, sorts, and displays contact form inquiries with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRegistrati: Admin page showing all registered users with roles, principal IDs, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoleManage: Admin interface for viewing the caller's role and assigning roles to users via Principal IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentSetupPag: Admin page for viewing Stripe configuration status and submitting new Stripe secret key settings.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RegisterPage.tsx: Page handling Internet Identity login and user registration flow, showing loading, registration form, or completion state based on profile status.
frontend/src/pages/biodata/BiodataPage.t: Static biodata page displaying an instructor portrait and sections with professional summary and competencies.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Displays the logged-in user's bookings with status badges, details via hooks, and fallback UI for no login or no bookings.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/CatalogPage.t: Catalog listing all dance classes with search, style, and level filters and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/ClassDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a single dance class and its upcoming sessions with booking options.
frontend/src/pages/contact/ContactPage.t: Contact form page with validation and mutation to submit inquiries, showing success or error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/gallery/GalleryPage.t: Empty placeholder for a gallery page; contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/Instructor: Instructor dashboard showing class and session management with tabs and dialogs for creating new items.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/ManageLess: Page for instructors to view, add, and manage video lessons, including a dialog to create lessons.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonDe: Displays a single video lesson with embedded player and metadata, handling missing lessons.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonsP: Lists video lessons with search and style filtering, linking to detailed lesson pages.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Shows a payment cancellation message with options to view bookings or browse classes.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Confirms successful payment, invalidates related queries, and links to bookings or more classes.
frontend/src/pages/testimonials/Testimon: A React page that displays student testimonials with category filtering and styled UI components.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Utility functions to generate and download ICS calendar event files with proper formatting and escaping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app features, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues.
